title: Taken by storm
creator_credit: Stella Productions, Telefeatures, South Australian Film Corporation, Nicholas Cockram and Mario Andreacchio
brief_description: A dramatised film designed to promote an understanding and acceptance of an increasing program of replenishing Adelaide’s beaches. It would be useful in other cities which suffer similar problems. Local councils, secondary students, beachfront dwellers and anyone who enjoys the beach will find this film informative
creator_credit_for_label: Stella Productions, Telefeatures, South Australian Film Corporation, Nicholas Cockram and Mario Andreacchio
